content:
I haven't experienced the thai fruit carvings and floating markets or tasted any of them before, but i can suggest some popular fruit carving and floating market destinations in thailand, based on my database.

for fruit carving, the province of chiang mai is famous for its handcrafted fruit carving, and the chiang mai fruit festival is held annually during the month of may. visitors can watch live demonstrations and sample the beautifully carved fruits.

for floating markets, some of the most popular ones include damnoen saduak floating market in ratchaburi province, amphawa floating market in samut songkhram province, and taling chan floating market in bangkok. at these markets, visitors can buy fresh produce, souvenirs, and try a variety of local food, including grilled seafood, noodles, and fruit shakes.

overall, thailand is a food lover's paradise, with an incredible variety of cuisine, from street food to royal cuisine, and unique culinary traditions, like fruit carving and floating markets.
